name: ID
comment: "this information may be obtained from the mouse book"

name: birth_date (yyyymmdd)
comment: "this information may be obtained from the mouse book"

name: genotype
comment: "this information may be obtained from the mouse book"

name: group
comment: "given if not automatically processed"

name: animal_ID
comment: "information about the animal is gathered in another data sheet, the mice book may be used"

name: experiment_ID
comment: "metadata about this experiment"

name: Video_name
comment: "name of path for the video file, starting from the experiment path given in the experiment metadata, gives also time start and cage position, do not add the suffix!"

name: experiment_ID
comment: "give it a 6 number code"

name: experimentator
comment: "e-mail of the experimentator"

name: Folder_path
comment: "path to the Folder of the experiment, if different from the path to the file"

name: group_by
comment: "variable of the animal metadata, which is used to create groups"

name: software_used
comment: "name of the software used for the video analysis, indicate version number."

name: Comments
comment: "free text comment for this experiment"

name: mousebook
comment: "path to the mousebook where information about the mice are kept"

name: ID
comment: "give it a 5 number code"

name: light_on
comment: "time of day when the light is on in the room (ZT0 time), format is HH:mm:ss"

name: light_off
comment: "time of day when the light is off , format is HH:mm:ss"

name: temperature
comment: "temperature in the room, in degree celcius, range:  21 - 23

name: cage_type
comment: "cage type used for that experiment (2,3,4)"

name: address
comment: "Gives the address of the lab where the experiment is performed"

name: north_position
comment: "give position of the north in degrees clockwise, 0 being the direction of the rack over the small side"

name: daylight_intensity_lux
comment: "measure light intensity 1 h after light on"

name: daylight_spectrum
comment: "what is the color spectrum of the daylight"
